Class.name: Strix.SCM.Handler
Class.Description: Base handler: determines the appropriate handler to use.

Method.name: UserAction
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.UserAction(Type, Name, InternalName, SelectedText, .Action, .Target, .Msg, .Reload)

Method.name: OnMenuItem
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnMenuItem(MenuName, InternalName, SelectedText, .Enabled, .DisplayName)

Method.name: AfterUserAction
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.AfterUserAction(Type, .Name, InternalName, Answer, Msg, .Reload)

Method.name: OnBeforeLoad
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnBeforeLoad(InternalName)

Method.name: OnAfterLoad
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnAfterLoad(InternalName, Object)

Method.name: OnBeforeSave
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnBeforeSave(InternalName, Location, Object)

Method.name: OnAfterSave
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnAfterSave(InternalName, Object)

Method.name: OnAfterStorage
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnAfterStorage(InternalName, Location)

Method.name: OnBeforeCompile
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnBeforeCompile(InternalName, .qstruct)

Method.name: OnAfterCompile
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnAfterCompile(InternalName)

Method.name: OnBeforeDelete
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnBeforeDelete(InternalName)

Method.name: OnAfterDelete
Method.Implementation: #dim Handler As Strix.SCM.Handler.Base Set Status = ##class(Strix.SCM.Project).GetHandler(InternalName, .Handler) If 'Status Quit Status Quit Handler.OnAfterDelete(InternalName)

Method.name: GetHandlers
Method.Description: Returns a list of classnames of all available handlers.
Method.Implementation:
Set Handlers = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New()
Set stm = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() Set sc = stm.%PrepareClassQuery("%Dictionary.ClassDefinitionQuery","SubclassOf") If 'sc Quit $$$BuildErr("Error preparing SubclassOf query:", sc) #dim rs As %SQL.StatementResult Set rs = stm.%Execute("Strix.SCM.Handler.Base")
While rs.%Next() { Set Name = rs.%Get("Name") Do Handlers.Insert(Name) }
Quit $$$OK
